'''Draft Hilichurl Ballads''' is a series of drafts rewarded for completing the [[Poetry Exchange]] commission.

==Vol. 1==
{{Description|A Hilichurlian poem created by [[Ella Musk]]. According to her, this Recital of Friendship is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...}}
Olah! Olah!<br />
Yoyo mosi mita!<br />
Nye, nye mosi mita,<br />
Yeye mosi gusha!<br />
Mosi gusha, mosi tiga,<br />
Yeye kucha kucha!
